snippet: The wheres and the whys of the modern pilgrim.
abstract: Author Charles Wilson highlights some of the odder destinations people travel to around the world, as well as memorably off-beat quests certain people have undertaken that took them to various locations. Charts, Drawings (M)
lead_paragraph: A man who calls himself Winter had visited 10,789 Starbucks as of the end of last month. His goal is to visit every one in the world. WHERE THE APPETITE LEADS
